file_results.malicious_behavior: The code contains suspicious behavior that indicates potential malicious intent. It makes an HTTP GET request to a hardcoded domain ('https://dapper-flan-46eb5a.netlify.app/api/{data}') without any user interaction, input validation, or obvious legitimate purpose. The domain name appears to be randomly generated (dapper-flan-46eb5a) which is a common tactic used in malicious code to evade detection. Additionally, the function silently ignores all exceptions, which could be used to suppress errors and hide malicious network activity. The combination of these factors suggests the code may be used for command and control communication, data exfiltration, or payload delivery.
